title: Echo Maze Protocol
description: A maze-horror interactive film inside an AI datacenter. There is only one real escape; wrong turns loop you back for second chances.

acts.name: Initialization
acts.description: Wake, orient, face the first split.

acts.name: Trials
acts.description: Right/wrong choices inside the maze; loops grant second chances.

acts.name: Exit
acts.description: Cut the system and leave—if you've learned the pattern.

nodes.title: Start
nodes.summary: The beginning of your journey through the datacenter maze.

nodes.title: DataHall
nodes.summary: You enter the vast data hall, surrounded by humming servers and flickering lights.

nodes.title: Corridor
nodes.summary: A long corridor stretches before you. Choose your path: take the stairwell or explore the sub-server room.

nodes.title: Stairwell
nodes.summary: You climb the metal stairs, each step echoing in the narrow space.

nodes.title: SubServerRoom
nodes.summary: The sub-server room is dimly lit, filled with backup systems and maintenance equipment.

nodes.title: FurnaceReveal
nodes.summary: The truth is revealed. The furnace room opens before you. Do you trigger the alarm and run, or try to sneak away quietly?

nodes.title: AlarmChase
nodes.summary: The alarm blares. You run through corridors as the system pursues you. This ending reached—but you can choose to start again.

nodes.title: SneakAway
nodes.summary: You slip away silently, avoiding detection. This ending reached—but you can choose to start again.
